item.title: cx_Freeze setup.py
item.description: from cx_Freeze import setup, Executable # http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa371847(v=vs.85).aspx shortcut_table = [ ("DesktopShortcut", # Shortcut "DesktopFolder", # Directory_ "YourAppDetailName", # App Name "TARGETDIR", # Component_ "[TARGETDIR]AppName.exe", # Target None, # Arguments None, # Description None, # Hotkey None, # Icon None, # IconIndex None, # ShowCmd 'TARGETDIR' # WkDir ) ] # Now create the table dictionary msi_data = {"Shortcut": shortcut_table} # Change some default MSI options and specify the use of the above defined tables bdist_msi_options = {'data': msi_data} # Dependencies are automatically detected, but it might need # fine tuning.
